text: Harjit Singh Sajjan PC OMM MSM CD MP (born September 6, 1970) is a Canadian Liberal politician. He was the Canadian Minister of National Defence. Sajjan is also a Member of Parliament representing the Vancouver South riding. He was a decorated lieutenant-colonel in the Canadian Armed Forces. Before becoming a politician he spent 11 years as a police officer and detective. As a teenager, Sajjan was baptised as a Sikh. == References == Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian Sikhs Category:Privy Councillors (Canada) Category:Politicians from Vancouver
title: Harjit Sajjan
